Question.Title: A Foreach... Next Loop:
Question.Answer_0: Conditionally executes a group of statements, depending on the value of an expression.
Question.Answer_1: Declares the name, parameters, and code that define a Function procedure.
Question.Answer_2: Repeats a group of statements for each element in a collection.
Question.Answer_3: Repeats a group of statements a specified number of times

Question.Title: Which of the following is an essential part of Foreach... Next loops?
